text: Avellino is a city in southern Italy. It is capital of the province of Avellino. ==Museums== * National Gallery of selachoidei (Museum of sharks), Corso Umberto I, 131 and Via F. Petronelli, 8 * Museum of Art - MdAO, Via degli Imbimbo, 47 * Museum of the Cathedral and the Diocese of Avellino, Via 23 novembre * Provincial Archaeological Museum, Corso Europa * Provincial Art Gallery, in the “Carcere Borbonico” * Zoological Museum of invertebrates "L. Carbone”, Corso Umberto I, 131 Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Avellino
